abstract: Popescu Gh. Cristina Raluca, Popescu N. Gheorghe, Popescu Veronica Adriana, Japanese miracle versus thirty-six years of excellence in American searching groping, The 2nd International Conference on „Leadership Perspectives at the University of Bucharest’s 150th Anniversary”, Centre for Organizational Strategies and Leadership Of the University of Bucharest, Session 1 - Leadership perspectives in the horizon of 2050 - Paper presentation, lucrare publicată în The ,,Manager’’ Journal, indexed in EBSCO-CEEAS, Ceeol , RePEc , DOAJ , INDEX COPERNICUS , PROQUEST , ULRICH , DRJI and Google Scholar international databases, ISSN-L 1453-0503, ISSN (e) 2286-170X, ISSN (p) 1453-0503, link: http://manager.faa.ro/archive/index.php?dir=manager_19%2F, Nr. 19/2014, pp. 18 – 26, indexat in bazele de date EBSCO-CEEAS, Ceeol, RePEc, DOAJ , INDEX COPERNICUS, PROQUEST, ULRICH, DRJI and Google Scholar international, http://manager.faa.ro/en/volumes/Manager, articol de 7 pagini.
